<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;SPIRVGenTables.inc&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace SPIRV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Misc functions for looking up builtins and veryfying requirements using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TableGen records</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv">SPIRV</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Parses the name part of the demangled builtin call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687">lookupBuiltinNameHelper</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a73ec33e21dcd539a96251529dc3e9">FPDecorationId</a> &#42;DecorationId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string PassPrefix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;(anonymous namespace)::&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string BuiltinName;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Itanium Demangler result may have &quot;(anonymous namespace)::&quot; prefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a2cd8968ff703aaeb395dcd63f6805ff1">starts&#95;with</a>(PassPrefix.c&#95;str()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BuiltinName = DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(PassPrefix.length());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BuiltinName = DemangledCall;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the builtin function name and types of arguments from the call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// skeleton.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BuiltinName = BuiltinName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(0, BuiltinName.find(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;(&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Account for possible &quot;&#95;&#95;spirv&#95;ocl&#95;&quot; prefix in SPIR-V friendly LLVM IR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BuiltinName.rfind(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;spirv&#95;ocl&#95;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 0) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BuiltinName = BuiltinName.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(12);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the extracted name contains type information between angle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// brackets. If so, the builtin is an instantiated template - needs to have</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Looks up the demangled builtin call in the SPIRVBuiltins.td records using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the provided \\p DemangledCall and specified \\p Set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The lookup follows the following algorithm, returning the first successful</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// match:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 Search with the plain demangled name (expecting a 1:1 match).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Search with the prefix before or suffix after the demangled name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// signyfying the type of the first argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns Wrapper around the demangled call and found builtin definition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;const SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba7165df55c01bd2653b37a6e9f4a8ae"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aba7165df55c01bd2653b37a6e9f4a8ae">lookupBuiltin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> DemangledCall,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">              SPIRV::InstructionSet::InstructionSet Set,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ReturnRegister, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8555f84b0afdf8f97a3dff75ed354ec2">SPIRVType</a> &#42;ReturnType,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerkernelarguments-cpp/#a1161e5a4e753384aaba3a8e4533c4261">Arguments</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string BuiltinName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#a1f67f9d068986121afe18f99677d1687">SPIRV::lookupBuiltinNameHelper</a>(DemangledCall);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;StringRef, 10&gt;</a> BuiltinArgumentTypes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> BuiltinArgs =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5d4c961b9b6f1da17df74b4496ecb30e">slice</a>(DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#aab312a8386488873bac2eddfc67c22be">find</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;(&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) + 1, DemangledCall.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#aab312a8386488873bac2eddfc67c22be">find</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;)&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BuiltinArgs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a0320b2a5a6d440bf4479a02e78cf5ca7">split</a>(BuiltinArgumentTypes, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;,&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, -1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look up the builtin in the defined set. Start with the plain demangled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// name, expecting a 1:1 match in the defined builtin set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirv/demangledbuiltin">SPIRV::DemangledBuiltin</a> &#42;Builtin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Builtin = SPIRV::lookupBuiltin(BuiltinName, Set)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the initial look up was unsuccessful and the demangled call takes at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// least 1 argument, add a prefix or suffix signifying the type of the first</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BuiltinArgumentTypes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstArgumentType = BuiltinArgumentTypes&#91;0&#93;&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prefix to be added to the builtin&#39;s name for lookup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, OpenCL &quot;abs&quot; taking an unsigned value has a prefix &quot;u&#95;&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string Prefix;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstArgumentType) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;u&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Signed:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;c&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Floating-point:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;f&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Set == SPIRV::InstructionSet::GLSL&#95;std&#95;450)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Prefix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;f&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If argument-type name prefix was added, look up the builtin again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Prefix.empty() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Builtin = SPIRV::lookupBuiltin(Prefix + BuiltinName, Set)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BuiltinName, Builtin, ReturnRegister, ReturnType, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerkernelarguments-cpp/#a1161e5a4e753384aaba3a8e4533c4261">Arguments</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If lookup with a prefix failed, find a suffix to be added to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// builtin&#39;s name for lookup. For example, OpenCL &quot;group&#95;reduce&#95;max&quot; taking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an unsigned value has a suffix &quot;u&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::string Suffix;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstArgumentType) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unsigned:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;u&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;u&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Signed:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;c&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;s&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;i&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;l&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;s&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Floating-point:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;f&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;d&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;h&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;f&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If argument-type name suffix was added, look up the builtin again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Suffix.empty() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (Builtin = SPIRV::lookupBuiltin(BuiltinName + Suffix, Set)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;SPIRV::IncomingCall&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">          BuiltinName, Builtin, ReturnRegister, ReturnType, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerkernelarguments-cpp/#a1161e5a4e753384aaba3a8e4533c4261">Arguments</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These queries ask for a single size&#95;t result for a given dimension index, e.g</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size&#95;t get&#95;global&#95;id(uint dimindex). In SPIR-V, the builtins corresonding to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these values are all vec3 types, so we need to extract the correct index or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return defaultVal (0 or 1 depending on the query). We also handle extending</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or tuncating in case size&#95;t does not match the expected result type&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bitwidth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a constant index &gt;= 3 we generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %res = OpConstant %SizeT 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For other indices we generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %g = OpVariable %ptr&#95;V3&#95;SizeT Input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  OpDecorate %g BuiltIn XXX</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  OpDecorate %g LinkageAttributes &quot;&#95;&#95;spirv&#95;BuiltInXXX&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  OpDecorate %g Constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  %loadedVec = OpLoad %V3&#95;SizeT %g</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Then, if the index is constant &lt; 3, we generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %res = OpCompositeExtract %SizeT %loadedVec idx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  If the index is dynamic, we generate:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %tmp = OpVectorExtractDynamic %SizeT %loadedVec %idx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %cmp = OpULessThan %bool %idx %const&#95;3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    %res = OpSelect %SizeT %cmp %tmp %const&#95;0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  If the bitwidth of %res does not match the expected return type, we add an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  extend or truncate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab28508dbb1f9996154ae13f70fa4f2e2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab28508dbb1f9996154ae13f70fa4f2e2">genWorkgroupQuery</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/spirv/incomingcall">SPIRV::IncomingCall</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIRBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1387"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42;GR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1388"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              SPIRV::BuiltIn::BuiltIn BuiltinValue,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1389"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              uint64&#95;t DefaultValue) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> IndexRegister = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;Arguments&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResultWidth = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;ReturnType-&gt;getOperand(1).getImm();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndexInstruction = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abc8c7c7ca66d38ff9fd8c34f64a0fd4e">getDefInstrMaybeConstant</a>(IndexRegister, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1397"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set up the final register to do truncation or extension on at the end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> ToTruncate = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>-&gt;ReturnRegister;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1400"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the index is constant, we can statically determine if it is in range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsConstantIndex =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IndexInstruction-&gt;getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::G&#95;CONSTANT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s out of range (max dimension is 3), we can just return the constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// default value (0 or 1 depending on which query function).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsConstantIndex &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4be60d034d7d51d22562497587db3344">getIConstVal</a>(IndexRegister, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>) &gt;= 3) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ToTruncate = DefaultReg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it could be in range, we need to load from the given builtin.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Vec3Ty =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set up the vreg to extract the result to (possibly a new temporary one).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2912"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ValidLiteral &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2913"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid format of SPIR-V builtin parameter literal!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetexttype/#a4807dd672ac18ce59733b41885eff1be">TargetExtType::get</a>(Context,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2917"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            NameWithParameters.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a25f1fd81f2132805676c82ab8ae0c109">substr</a>(0, BaseNameLength),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2919"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#aac0431719235a7ccda58a3df4894d130"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8555f84b0afdf8f97a3dff75ed354ec2">SPIRVType</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/#aac0431719235a7ccda58a3df4894d130">lowerBuiltinType</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpaqueType,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            SPIRV::AccessQualifier::AccessQualifier AccessQual,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIRBuilder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42;GR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In LLVM IR, SPIR-V and OpenCL builtin types are represented as either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target(...) target extension types or pointers-to-opaque-structs. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// approach relying on structs is deprecated and works only in the non-opaque</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer mode (-opaque-pointers=0).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to maintain compatibility with LLVM IR generated by older versions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of Clang and LLVM/SPIR-V Translator, the pointers-to-opaque-structs are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;translated&quot; to target extension types. This translation is temporary and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will be removed in the future release of LLVM.</span></CodeLine>
